projects.title: YouTube Video Summarizer
projects.description: An AI-powered tool that converts YouTube audio into text and summarizes it using Whisper and BART NLP models. Built with Django.

projects.title: Evoza Browser
projects.description: A lightweight custom web browser built using JavaFX and WebView. Includes navigation controls, custom URL bar, and modern UI.

projects.title: Obesity Prediction Model
projects.description: A machine learning model classifying individuals into weight categories using healthcare data and Random Forest classifier.

projects.title: Nepali Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: An NLP model detecting sentiment in Nepali-language text using TF‑IDF and traditional classification algorithms.

projects.title: Himalai Expense Tracker (Backend)
projects.description: RESTful backend for an expense-tracking app using Django REST Framework, JWT authentication, expense categorization, and reporting endpoints.

projects.title: Jawafai (Android App)
projects.description: An Android chatbot app currently in development using Kotlin. Features conversational UI powered by custom NLP logic.

projects.title: Laxmi Beekeeping
projects.description: A business website for honey production with responsive product pages and secure payment integration.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Single‑page Django-driven personal portfolio with clean animations, a floating sidebar, and responsive design.
